verses.roman:
kata-kṣaṇe prabhura kāṇe śabda paraśila
huṅkāra kariyā prabhu tabahi uṭhila

synonyms: kata-kṣaṇe—after some time; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kāṇe—within the ear; śabda—the sound; paraśila—entered; huṅkāra kariyā—making a loud sound; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tabahi—immediately; uṭhila—got up.
translation: After some time, the sound of the holy name entered the ear of the Lord, who immediately got up, making a great noise.
